title.rendered: Dr Selva Pankaj conducts workshop at Berlin

content.rendered: Dr Selva Pankaj, Principal of Regent College London and the creator of the Thinking into Character programme conducted an engaging workshop on ‘The creation of success and self-fulfilment’ at the Adam Global International Business Forum and Annual General Meeting at Berlin on 27th September. He also gave a speech on introducing the education vertical at Adam Global.
